message:
SYSTEM: SparqlDQPGrupo.pdf: Página 37
Way of working at NeSC
• National eScience Centre
• More academic focused than EPCC
• Every week session on what papers are we going to 
publish, ideas, papers published and deadlines
• More research focused
• Example: talking to people from different groups
• EPCC focused on the poor performance of the automatic 
composition of data mining workflows in ADMIRE
• There are going to be many problems there
• NeSC focused on wow! We are getting nice results and we 
will publish them!
speaker: SYSTEM
